Uses of Package
io.hekate.messaging

  • Packages that use io.hekate.messaging 
    Package Description
    io.hekate.core
    « start hereMain entry point to Hekate API.
    io.hekate.messaging
    MessagingService API.
    io.hekate.messaging.broadcast
    Broadcast API.
    io.hekate.messaging.loadbalance
    Load balancer API.
    io.hekate.messaging.unicast
    Unicast API.
    io.hekate.rpc
    RpcService API.
    io.hekate.spring.bean.messaging
    Support for importing the MessagingService into the Spring context.
    io.hekate.spring.boot.messaging
    Auto-configuration for MessagingService.

    Class and Description
    Message
    Message with arbitrary payload.
    MessageBase
    Base interface for messages.
    MessageInterceptor
    Message interceptor.
    MessageInterceptor.InboundContext
    Context for MessageInterceptor.interceptInbound(Object, InboundContext).
    MessageInterceptor.OutboundContext
    Context for MessageInterceptor.interceptOutbound(Object, OutboundContext).
    MessageInterceptor.ReplyContext
    Context for MessageInterceptor.interceptReply(Object, ReplyContext) .
    MessageReceiver
    Message receiver.
    MessageTimeoutException
    Signals that messaging operation timed out.
    MessagingBackPressureConfig
    Back pressure configuration of a MessagingChannel.
    MessagingChannel
    Messaging channel.
    MessagingChannelConfig
    Configuration options for a MessagingChannel.
    MessagingChannelId
    Universally unique identifier of a messaging channel.
    MessagingConfigBase
    Common configuration options for components that provide messaging support.
    MessagingConfigProvider
    Provider of messaging channels configuration.
    MessagingEndpoint
    Remote messaging endpoint.
    MessagingException
    Failure of a messaging operation.
    MessagingFuture
    Asynchronous result of a messaging operation.
    MessagingFutureException
    Failure of an asynchronous messaging operation.
    MessagingOverflowPolicy
    Policy that defines how MessagingChannel should behave in case of its send queue overflow.
    MessagingService
    « start hereMain entry point to messaging API.
    MessagingServiceFactory
    Factory for MessagingService.
